fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.equipments.heater

Class Heater

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.equipments.heater.Heater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, HeaterExternalControlI, HeaterInternalControlI, HeaterTemperatureI, HeaterUserI

    public class Heater
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements HeaterUserI, HeaterInternalControlI
    The class Heater implements a heater component.

    Description

    Glass-box Invariants

     invariant       MAX_POWER_LEVEL > 0.0
 invariant       currentState != null
 invariant       targetTemperature >= -50.0 && targetTemperature <= 50.0
 invariant       currentPowerLevel >= 0.0 && currentPowerLevel <= MAX_POWER_LEVEL

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       USER_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !USER_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       INTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !INTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       EXTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !EXTERNAL_CONTROL_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0

    Created on : 2023-09-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
